items.content_html: Simple JSON Database using Node.js with fs module. This repository provides a lightweight database solution using JSON files, ideal for small-scale applications where a full-scale database might be overkill. Built for simplicity and ease of integration with Node.js projects.
items.title: i3raby/JSON-Database: Simple JSON Database using Node.js with fs module. This repository provides a lightweight database solution using JSON files, ideal for small-scale applications where a full-scale database might be overkill. Built for simplicity and ease of integration with Node.js projects.
